text: I'd like to take this time to say congratulations and well done on completing the volume profiling course. Thank you for believing in me, your mentor. I hope that you've enjoyed this journey. It's been a real adventure creating this course and my sole objective was to guide you to understanding the volume profiling tool and the key elements in the trading environment that are required. This is merely the beginning of your trading journey. It's now time to take your understanding to the next level. You're going to do this by continuously developing your playbook and your profitable strategies and ensure you're constantly working hard at them to ensure profitability. I'd like to share my final thoughts with you over ten phrases. First, develop real skills. Second, every decision you make should have an end objective which is ultimately to be profitable. Number three, there is no wrong or right in trading, only high probability and low probability. Number four, be patient, be determined, be disciplined and have a very strong work ethic. These are the four necessities required for success. It only takes one good trade. Number six, keep it simple. The markets are after all only binary. They only go up and down. Number seven, always manage risk first and foremost. Number eight, always remain objective. Number nine, be honest with yourself. Be open with yourself and always be ready to learn. Lastly, number 10, the secret to trading. Understand the game you're playing. Understand the rules that you need to follow and most importantly understand yourself. Winston Churchill once said, success is going from failure to failure without a loss of enthusiasm. Thank you very much, good luck and I wish you a successful trading career.
